text:
@BrianKarem @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Then Trump must be senile.

Trump seems to forget all the critical National Security intelligence briefings almost as soon as he hears them.

Trump doesn't remember being told about #Coronavirus in January.

Trump doesn't remember being told about #BountyGate in February.
